types.html:
tchop f (plural tchops)

  1. (slang) automobile, whip
    • 2020 March 13, Lazamah, “BDFDP”, in Pimp‎[1]:
      Y’a les gyrophares qui éclairent la tchop mais on s’arrête pas
      There are sirens lightening the cars but one does not hold on

title: tchop
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /tʃɔp/
